title: I hope riot decides to keep bots
body:
Bot's are great. So great they deserve a poem. So here goes...a poem as bad as my team
I like them. More than my team (I'm bronze)
They do most things I wish my team would do (like get objectives
and do less of the things I wish my team wouldn't do
They don't charge in 1v5 wondering why no one helped them (unlike my team)
and definitely don't flame (unlike my team)
their builds are decent (unlike my team's)
They're very predictable and not much hard (unlike my team)
But they play like a team (unlike my team)
and so I hope riot decides to keep bots

replies.body: there was no rhythm or rhyme to this so-called 'poem' of yours, I would request that you please return to your high-school English class. (Before anyone flames me this is just banter)

You never know, it might be in free verse or blank verse or one of these types of verses that I totally didn't just find out about on Wikipedia ; ) 

Anyway, even though it's pretty avant garde stuff you can **feel** the love towards bots : )
